name: The Shop (Dolfinx)
description:
2020 was a challenging year. We were faced with many challenges, some new, and unprecedented, and some we were unfortunately far too familiar with... 

In The Shop, narrative game where you are put in the shoes of a shop owner, who is trying to run is convenient store during a global pandemic, and civil rights movement. You are trying to make ends meet while meeting with a variety of customers. 

This game was made for a Miami University Capstone project. The game was coded and marketed by Nando Zegarra (Class of 2021). Art and narrative design was done by Kyrah Gayle (Class of 2021). 

We would love to hear your feedback! Let us know on Twitter https://bit.ly/3tBZIRR
